DOC.detailed_description: Atherosclerosis chronic inflammatory disease characterize lipid deposition macrophages/foam cell accumulation beneath arterial intima . Immune competent cell abundant atherosclerotic lesion , produce mainly proinflammatory cytokine . Macrophages play central role stage pathogenesis atherosclerosis . At begin , so-called foam cell contribute formation early lesion ; mature plaque , macrophage constitute 50 % cell lesion ; finally , involve mechanism lead plaque rupture . The primary objective study ass whether inflammatory receptor play role pathogenesis atherosclerosis .
DOC.criteria: Study Population 1 Patients STelevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) angiographic evidence massive thrombosis culprit artery undergo primary percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) Criteria STelevation myocardial infarction Angiographic evidence massive thrombosis culprit artery Indication primary percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) Able understand willing sign inform CF • Women child bear potential patient must demonstrate negative pregnancy test perform within 24 hour CT Study Population 2 Patients coronary artery disease stable condition schedule undergo elective percutaneous coronary intervention patient Criteria A de novo native coronary artery lesion ( reference vessel diameter:2.53.75 mm ) Class I indication elective percutaneous coronary intervention Stable condition recent acute coronary syndrome Normal baseline value marker myocardial damage ( creatine kinase , creatine kinaseMB , myoglobin , troponin I ) Able understand willing sign inform CF • Women child bear potential patient must demonstrate negative pregnancy test perform within 24 hour CT
